downloadDescription: This Outlook Holiday (.hol) file provides the holidays for Iran for use with Outlook in Office 2016
detailsSection: This Outlook Holiday (.hol) file provides the holidays for Iran for use with Outlook in Office 2016  It can be installed in fa-IR, en-US or ar-SA
systemRequirementsSection:
Microsoft Windows 7 - 32 or 64 bit OS
Microsoft Windows 8 - 32 or 64 bit OS
Microsoft Windows 10 - 32 or 64 bit OS
installInstructionSection:
Follow these steps to update your existing Outlook Holiday file.

1. Exit Outlook if it is running.

2. In Microsoft Windows Explorer, delete the following file:
drive\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\LCID\outlook.hol.
or
drive\Program Files\Microsoft Office\root\Office16\LCID\outlook.hol.

Note LCID is your locale identification (LCID) number. For more information about LCID numbers, see KB2764690.

3. Paste updated outlook.hol into same directory.

4. Restart Outlook.
